mapper.select: SELECT t.*,COALESCE(tp.problem_count,0) as problem_count FROM ( select t.*,tc.name as category_name,tc.color as category_color from training t left join mapping_training_category mtc on t.id = mtc.tid left join training_category tc on mtc.cid = tc.id where t.gid = #{gid} and t.status = true ) t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT tp.tid,COUNT(*) AS problem_count FROM training_problem tp,problem p WHERE tp.pid = p.id AND p.auth = 1 GROUP BY tp.tid ) tp ON t.id = tp.tid WHERE t.gid = #{gid} ORDER BY t.rank ASC
SELECT t.* FROM training t WHERE t.gid = #{gid} ORDER BY t.id DESC
